title: Strengthening Learning Design Practice Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Mastery for Adult Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core elements of self-regulated learning strategies (planning, goal-setting, self-assessment, self-regulation, environment management) with 90% accuracy
Learners can improve learning efficiency by 30% by applying self-regulated learning strategies to work projects
Learners can diagnose their learning strategies and develop improvement plans using smartphone-based assessment tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
